name: Dell Inspiron 15 3000 Series Laptop
description: 15.6-inch laptop with the latest processors and a glossy finish. It also has a spacious hard drive and impressive graphics capabilities.

name: Apple iPhone 13 Pro Max
description: 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, A15 Bionic chip, 5G capable, Pro camera system, Ceramic Shield front cover, and more.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7+
description: 12.4-inch Super AMOLED display, S Pen included, 5G capable, quad speakers sound by AKG, and more.

name: HP Spectre x360 Laptop
description: 13.3-inch touch screen, 11th Gen Intel® Core™ i7-1165G7 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, Intel® Iris® Xe graphics, and more.

name: Alienware Aurora R12 Gaming Desktop
description: 11th Gen Intel® Core™ processors, NVIDIA® GeForce RTX™ 30 Series graphics, and a customizable chassis with RGB lighting.

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: Ultra-high-speed SSD, haptic feedback, adaptive triggers, 3D Audio, and more.

name: Dell XPS 13
description: The Dell XPS 13 features a 13.4-inch display, 11th Gen Intel Core processors, and a sleek design.

name: Apple iPad Pro
description: The Apple iPad Pro features a 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, M1 chip, 5G, and a 12MP Wide camera.

name: Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra
description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 Ultra features a 6.8-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display, Exynos 2100 or Snapdragon 888 chipset, 5G, and a quad-camera system.

name: HP Pavilion Desktop
description: The HP Pavilion Desktop features an Intel Core i7 processor, NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 graphics, and a minimalist design.

name: PlayStation 5
description: The PlayStation 5 features a custom AMD Zen 2 processor, 16GB of GDDR6 RAM, and a built-in 825GB SSD.

name: LG OLED C1 Series
description: The LG OLED C1 Series features a 4K OLED display, webOS 6.0, and support for Dolby Vision IQ, HDR10, and HLG.

name: Nikon D3500
description: 24.2 MP DX-format CMOS sensor, EXPEED 4 image processor

name: Apple Watch Series 7
description: The largest, most advanced Always-on Retina display yet

name: Sony PlayStation 5
description: Ultra-High Speed SSD, Ray Tracing, Haptic Feedback, Backwards Compatibility
